title: Cave Explorer
description:
Cave Explorer, by John Earnest

Discover the secrets of a mysterious tunnel system.

W (Keypad: 5) - Move up
A (Keypad: 7) - Move left
S (Keypad: 8) - Move down
D (Keypad: 9) - Move right
E (Keypad: 6) - Pick up/set down blocks
Q (Keypad: 4) - Reset level

title: Danm8ku
description:
Danm8ku, by buffi

Bullet hell for the CHIP-8! Survive 8 waves of exciting bullet patterns!

W (Keypad: 5) - Move up
A (Keypad: 7) - Move left
S (Keypad: 8) - Move down
D (Keypad: 9) - Move right

title: Space Invaders
description:
Space Invaders, by David Winter

Q (Keypad: 4) - Move left
E (Keypad: 6) - Move right
W (Keypad: 5) - Start/Shoot

title: Tetris
description:
Tetris (1991), by Fran Dachille

W (Keypad: 5) - Move left
E (Keypad: 6) - Move right
Q (Keypad: 4) - Rotate left
A (Keypad: 7) - Fast drop
